courses.name: C
courses.desc: We start from scratch and end up to creating more complex programs like ones using threads or graphical interface in ncurses for instance.

courses.name: Java
courses.desc: Learn java and Oriented-object programming. We also dig into JavaFX, Swing and AWT, Libgdx and lwjgl3.

courses.name: PHP
courses.desc: Learn how complex, weird and vast PHP is, and a bit about framework PHP.
